all_text_timv: Ying Quartet. American anthem [sound recording] / the music of Samuel Barber & Howard Hanson. Boyce, Va. : Sono Luminus, [2013] ℗2013 1 audio disc : digital ; 4 3/4 in. + 1 audio disc (digital (Blu-ray) ; 4 3/4 in.) performed music prm rdacontent audio s rdamedia audio disc sd rdacarrier Compact disc. Program notes included in container. String quartet op. 11 (21:38) ; Serenade for string quartet, op. 1 (8:28) ; Dover Beach, op. 3 (8:08) / Samuel Barber -- String quartet op. 23 (15:09) ; Concerto da camera, op. 7 (15:18) / Howard Hanson -- Alleluia (5:21) / Randall Thompson ; arranged by Ying Quartet.
